document_data.name: Olara
document_data.titles: Sister{{Cite adventurers league/Eye of the Tempest|31}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Olara''' was a monk at the [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]].
document_data.Activities: Olara was a monk in the Monastery of the Yellow Rose and a member of the Order of the Scroll of the [[Disciples of St. Sollars the Twice-Martyred]]. Her duty was to act as a librarian. Secretly, she was also a member of the [[Cult of Howling Hatred]].
document_data.History: Olara was one of the cultists who infiltrated the monastery in [[1491 DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Eye of the Tempest|8}} When the adventurers arrived at the monastery, they confronted her.
document_data.Relationship: Olara was the lover of [[Glavel]], a fellow cultist.
document_data.Personality: Olara was a little crazy, mumbling to herself on occasion. It wasn't easy convincing her to talk.
